participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective. Enjoys solitude and values childhood memories.
participant_1.background: I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood. I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage. My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating. I use my imagination to dance in my head. I am nearly 6 tall.

participant_2.name: Jin
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous. Loves music and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I enjoyed listening to my neighbors' conversations while I was mountain biking last year. I'm a musician who enjoys Kpop and broke my nose in a fight when I was young. I like to go to the farmers market every weekend. I own a black suburban. I'm taking online classes.

content.text: Hey, my name is Alex! How are you doing today?
Hi Alex! I am doing great, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I am doing well! I am a writer and I like to use my solitude to my creative advantage.
That's really interesting! I am a musician who enjoys Kpop and broke my nose in a fight when I was young.
Oh wow! That's quite the story! Do you still enjoy music?
Yes, I still love music! I play the guitar and I sing.
That's great! Do you have any songs you would like to share with me?
Sure, I have a song called "Love Yourself" by BTS.
I love that song! It is so catchy.
Me too! I love the message of the song.
I also like to go to the farmers market every weekend.
Really? What do you like to get at the farmers market?
I like to get fresh fruits and vegetables. I also like to get flowers.
That sounds delicious! I love fresh fruit and vegetables.
I also like to go hiking and biking.
Me too! I love being outdoors.
I am glad we have so many things in common.
Me too! I think we would make great friends.
I think so too!
Why don't we exchange numbers and stay in touch?
That sounds like a great idea! Here is my number.
Awesome! I just sent you a text message
